column4: hello, i'm having serious problems with my ftp client on ubuntu (and not any other machine - like my schools freebsd machine)
it times out after i type 2 or 3 commands
did anyone have to modify there ftp client (the cli one: /usr/bin/ftp) to use it on ubuntu
if you are connecting with a ftp "active" client, do you have you opened port TCP 20 on the firewall?
